job.title: Engineering Coordinator
job.description: Responsibilities:Guide certification samples for UL, FCC etc through manufacturing and test processesWork with cross functional groups (Engineering, Operations, Manufacturing)Must be able to lift 50 lbs- our units are heavy and bulkyCoordinate prototype builds with local PCB and PCBA housesWill create part numbers in PLM system for legacy products - ARENA preferred/highly desirableOrganize and manage engineering inventories for new product development projectsTrack sample shipments and incoming material for traceabilityTrack QA inspections in spreadsheet and publish monthly so defect patterns are summarizedRMA of lab equipment as neededExperience:Experience with PCBs and PCBAs,Some work in the test and validation (highly desirable)Familiar with PLMs systems – MS Office Suite (Excel)Understands BOMs, ECO’s and part creationSoft Skills:Self starter, eager, motivated and highly organizedGood command of English languageAttention to detail- has a sense of urgencyComfortable in a high powered environmentOrganize lab space- tidy work space expected, hands on and can keep a neatly organized work space
